image-alt: blocks of characters that spell the word "tutorial"
title: New tutorial page!
paragraph: Check out the popular tutorials developed by U of I Librarians!

title: Welcome to the Library!
paragraph: Online and in-person we're the place where you can find information, resources, and spaces to help you succeed and create.

title: Chat help is available 24/7!
paragraph: Don't know where to start on that assignment? Get research help from a librarian 24 hours a day via chat!

title: Board Games Collection!
paragraph: Need a study break? Take home one of the library's board games! Find them on the first floor of the library by the magazines.

image-alt: historic photograph of women dressed in surplus civil war uniforms holding rifles
title: Stories from Spec
paragraph: Check out Special Collections and Archives' Harvester blog featuring the unique materials stewarded by the library.

title: Borrow Tech
paragraph: Laptops, cameras, and hotspots, oh my! The library has equipment you can check out.
